channel.title: Crossbow Misses at Point Blank
channel.description: It seems the crossbow bolt spawns some distance in front of the player, I had an instance of an HECU marine standing directly in front of me who ate two bolts like it was nothing. Only upon shooting the third and having a marine behind him get killed did I realize that we're too close to fire the cannons, so to speak.
